rules_text:
When Western Army Commander enters, create three 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature tokens with “When this creature dies, surveil 1.” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Sacrifice a creature: Warlocks and Demons you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
